description: Un Posto a Milan is a farmhouse in the city: an ideal place to spend a few hours outdoors, but also an agricultural market, a kitchen serving food, a carpentry workshop and a venue offering a host of other activities. The menu features traditional Italian dishes (sometimes given a modern twist), made with top-quality fresh, seasonal and – as far as possible – organic ingredients.
